name: ThomasKDesign.net
body:
## Hi and thank you for stopping by!

My name is Thomas Kaiaua and this is just my portfolio page, which contains some of my work in web development! I'm a junior developer, and so I won't have some fancy site with all the bells and whistles, yet!! Below I have some projects I've done, or head over to GitHub for a more complete list or just [click here!](https://github.com/ThomasKDesign?tab=repositories)

  - [DOM Manipulation](http://www.thomaskdesign.net/wats1020-dom-manipulation/)
  - [DOM Basics](http://www.thomaskdesign.net/wats1020-dom-basics/)
  - [Validating Form Data](http://www.thomaskdesign.net/wats1020-validating-form-data/)
  - [Imaginary Online Store-Html and CSS ](http://www.thomaskdesign.net/wats1010-product-page/)
  - [Static Website Deployment Using Apache Server ](http://2048.thomaskdesign.net/)
   

And so, stay tuned! It will go through changes from time to time!

Come visit again in the not-so-distant future, and maybe I'll have something much better to showcase by then!!

©Thomas Kaiaua, 2016. Look me up on [Pinterest](https://www.pinterest.com/ThomasKaiaua/) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ThomasKaiaua).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
